name: Smuggler's Harvester
agent effect: If you sent an Agent to a Maker board space this turn you gain 1 spice.

name: Space-time Folding
agent effect: When you send an agent you may discard card from your hand to draw card. If you discarded a Spacing Guild card you must draw one more card.

name: Unswerving Loyalty
reveal effect: If you have Fremen Bond you may deploy or retreat one of your troops.

name: Weirding Woman
agent effect: If you have another Bene Gesserit card in play, return this card from play to your hand.

name: Desert Survival
agent effect: You may trash one card from your hand, discard pile, or in play

name: Fedaykin Stilltent
agent effect: If you sent an Agent to a Maker board space this turn you gain 1 troop.

name: Hidden Missive
agent effect: If you have 2 influence on Bene Gesserit faction you recruit one troop and draw card.

name: Imperial Spymaster
agent effect: If you recalled a Spy this turn you draw 1 Intrigue.

name: Maker Keeper
agent effect:
If you have 2 influence on Bene Gesserit faction - gain 1 water.
If you have 2 influence on Fremen faction - gain 1 spice.

name: Reliable Informant
agent effect: When you play this card you may place a Spy from your supply on an unoccupied observation post next to Spacing Guild, Bene Gesserit or Fremen location.

name: Spy Network
reveal effect: if you have two or more Spies on the board you may recall a Spy to draw 1 Intrigue.

name: Undercover Asset
agent effect: Ignore Influence requirements on board spaces when sending an Agent this turn.

name: Wheels Within Wheels
agent effect: If you have 2 influence on Emperor faction - gain 2 solari. If you have 2 influence on Spacing Guild faction - gain 1 spice.

name: Bene Gesserit Operative
agent effect: You may place a Spy from your supply on an unoccupied observation post on the board.
reveal effect: if you have two or more Spies on the board gain 2 additional persuasion.

name: Branching Path
agent effect: If you have Bene Gesserit Alliance you may trash an Intrigue card to draw 1 Intrigue and gain 2 spice.

name: Calculus of Power
agent effect: You may trash one card from your hand, discard pile, or in play.
reveal effect: you may trash another Emperor card you have in play to gain 3 swords.

name: Cargo Runner
agent effect: If you have completed two or more contracts draw a card from your deck. If you have completed four or more contracts draw an additional card from your deck.

name: Covert Operation
agent effect: Each opponent discards a card.

name: Dangerous Rhetoric
agent effect:
Gain one Influence. Choose any one
of the four Factions. You must trash this card.

name: Double Agent
agent effect: Place a Spy from your supply on the board space you sent an Agent to this turn. You may place this Spy on the same observation post as another player's Spy.

name: Ecological Testing Station
agent effect: You may pay 2 water to draw 2 cards.
reveal effect: if you have Fremen Bond gain 1 water.

name: Guild Envoy
agent effect: you must discard a card from your hand. If you discarded a Spacing Guild card you draw 2 cards.

name: Guild Spy
agent effect: you may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. If you discarded a Spacing Guild card you draw 1 Intrigue.
reveal effect: if you acquire The Spice Must Flow this turn, gain one Influence with each Faction you are spying on.

name: Maula Pistol
agent effect: Draw a card from your deck.

name: Northern Watermaster
agent effect: Gain 1 water.
reveal effect: if you have Fremen Bond gain 2 spice.

name: Rebel Supplier
agent effect: If you recalled a Spy this turn you gain 2 troops.

name: Paracompass
agent effect: Gain 2 solari.
reveal effect: if you have a seat on the High Council gain 2 persuasion and if you also have a Swordmaster gain 1 additional persuasion.

name: Public Spectacle
agent effect: If you recalled a Spy this turn gain 1 Influence with any Faction.

name: Sardaukar Coordination
agent effect: You may deploy any troops you recruit this turn to the Conflict.
reveal effect: 1 sword for each Emperor card you revealed (including this one).

name: Shishakli
agent effect: You may trash one card from your hand, discard pile, or in play to draw a card.
reveal effect: if you have Fremen Bond gain 1 Influence with Fremen faction.

name: Smuggler's Haven
agent effect: You may pay 4 spice to gain 1 victory point.
reveal effect: if you are spying on a Maker board space gain 2 spice.

name: Southern Elders
agent effect: If you have another Bene Gesserit card in play gain 2 troops.
reveal effect: if you have Fremen Bond gain 2 persuasion.

name: Tread in Darkness
agent effect: If you have another Bene Gesserit card in play you may trash one card from your hand, discard pile, or in play and draw a card.

name: Truthtrance
agent effect: You may discard a card from your hand to draw 1 Intrigue and draw a card from your deck.

name: Captured Mentat
reveal effect: you may lose 1 Influence with any Faction to gain 1 Influence with any Faction.

name: Chani, Clever Tactician
agent effect: If you have three or more units in the Conflict draw 1 Intrigue.
reveal effect: you may retreat two of your troops to gain 4 swords and if you have Fremen Bond gain 2 persuasion.

name: Delivery Agreement
agent effect: You may discard a card from your hand to take a face-up contract.
reveal effect: if you have completed four or more contracts you may trash this card to gain 1 victory point.

name: In High Places
agent effect: If you have another Bene Gesserit card in play: draw a card from your deck and place a Spy from your supply on an unoccupied observation post on the board.
reveal effect: you may recall 2 spies to gain 3 additional persuasion.

name: Leadership
agent effect: For each sandworm you have in the Conflict draw a card from your deck.
reveal effect: 1 additional sword for each other revealed card that provides one or more swords this turn.

name: Spacing Guild's Favor
agent effect: draw a card from your deck.
reveal effect: you may pay 3 spice to gain 1 Influence with any Faction.

name: Strike Fleet
agent effect: If you recalled a Spy this turn gain 3 troops.

name: Subversive Advisor
agent effect: If you sent an Agent to a Faction board space this turn, gain two Influence instead of one and trash this card.

name: Theacherous Maneuver
agent effect: You may trash this card and an Emperor card from your hand to gain two Influence instead of one.

name: Corrinth City
agent effect: You may discard 2 cards from your hand and pay 5 solari to gain 1 victory point.
reveal effect: you may pay 5 solari to take your seat on the High Council (if you haven't already).

name: Desert Power
agent effect: If you sent an Agent to a Maker board space this turn gain 2 spice.
reveal effect: if you have Maker Hooks you may pay water to summon and deploy one sandworm

name: Junction Headquaters
agent effect: If you have Spacing Guild Alliance you may trash an Intrigue card and pay 2 spice to gain 1 victory point.

name: Price is No Object
agent effect: You may acquire a card to your hand using Solari instead of Persuasion.

name: Priority Contracts
agent effect: Take a face-up contract.
reveal effect: if you have completed four or more contracts you may trash this card to gain 1 victory point.

name: Stilgar, The Devoted
agent effect: Gain 2 troops.
reveal effect: you gain 2 persuasion for each Fremen card you have in play (including this one).

name: Interstellar Trade
agent effect: Gain 1 Influence with any Faction.
reveal effect: you gain 1 persuasion for each contract you have completed.

name: Long Live the Fighters
agent effect: If your deck has three or more cards, look at the top three cards. Draw one, discard one, and trash one (trash is mandatory).

name: Overthrow
agent effect: Gain two Influence instead of one.

name: Steersman
agent effect: Draw a card from your deck and return one of your other Agents on the board to your Leader (not the Agent you sent during this turn).
